Error with directx 11

Thanks gansuk, works well, & of course, thanks to Ka0s for yet another job well done. At first It wouldn't work for me, but I forgot about the STEAM requirement; you don't need steam to run the game, just the registry entry to trick the game into thinking that you do. If you don't have, & don't want STEAM on your PC, then export any regfile from your registry, then go to edit & wipe all data, then make that file look like this: 
http://bayimg.com/MAGmBaaeG
I have paused all my other torrents to help seed this game. +1 from me.

Oh yeah, make sure to enter the updated regkey into the registry; it doesn't matter what you name the file. To make it easier for you, just copy & paste this info into the blank file, but use the picture above to fill in the backslashes which TPB removes by default:

Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREValve]

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREValveSteam]
"Language"="english"
"InstallPath"="C:\Program Files\Steam"
"SteamPID"=dword:00000000
"TempAppCmdLine"=""
"TempAppPath"=""

The game looks good, I've taken the day off work to check it out  :)
